name: Bria Replace Background - Image to Image
display_name: Bria Replace Background - Image to Image
description: Bria Replace Background swaps backgrounds using text or image prompts, enabling natural and creative scene changes.

prompt.description: The prompt you would like to use to generate images.

negative_prompt.description: The negative prompt you would like to use to generate images.

reference_image.description: The URL of the reference image to be used for generating the new background. Use "" to leave empty. Either ref_image_url or bg_prompt has to be provided but not both. If both ref_image_url and ref_image_file are provided, ref_image_url will be used. Accepted formats are jpeg, jpg, png, webp.

seed.description: The same seed and the same prompt given to the same version of the model will output the same image every time.

fast.description: Whether to use the fast model
